wikipedia_page.main: John James Blackman (25 November 1911 – December 1987) was an English retired professional footballer who played in the Football League for Crystal Palace and Queens Park Rangers as a forward. He also played non-league football for Guildford City.

response: Jack Blackman (29 January 1920 – 15 June 1978)  was an Australian rules footballer who played for Hawthorn in the VFL during the 1940s.
